players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Bob.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Alice: 'Bob was found dead last night. I think we should focus on figuring out who among us is the detective. Diana, you seem quiet—do you have any thoughts on who might be suspicious?'"
Diana: "I investigated Alice last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We should vote her out to protect the town."

Charlie: "Alice has been accused by Diana, who claims to be the detective. This is serious—if Diana is telling the truth, we must consider voting Alice out. Diana, can you tell us more about your investigation?"
You: "Alice: 'Diana, your claim is convenient but unverified. Why reveal your investigation now? If you're the detective, you risk being targeted. Charlie, do you trust Diana’s word so quickly?'"
Diana: "I stand by my investigation—Alice is the mafioso. We can't risk another night; vote her out now to save the town."
Charlie: "I trust Diana’s claim for now. Bob is dead, and we can’t afford to waste time. Voting Alice out seems like the best move to protect the town."
